I.RUN:
12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Slide - Shrink + Nbsp,,Shrinks all spaces between boxes
Resizes also Nbsp boxes (the E);01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Slide - Slip,,Preserves all spaces between boxes - moves all the boxes;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Slide - Shrink + Error,,Shrinks all spaces between boxes
or if impossible to shrink moves box freely;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Slide - Error + Merge,,Moves box freely and merges the overflowed ones;01/09/2010,0,milestone;01/11/2010,3,fixed,no merge;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,bound

;*12/28/2009*2*bound;01/02/2010*11*box*Slide - none, +Ctrl = Slip, +Shift = Error**Combines the three methods
Normally moves box only within its surrounding empty space
With held Ctrl moves the whole row
Width held Shift moves box freely;01/15/2010*3**A;01/18/2010*2**B;01/22/2010*2**C;3**D;1*nbsp*E;1**F;01/29/2010*2**G;02/04/2010*2*fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Move - Shift,,Moves box inside or outside the row
in this row it places the box exactly to the position specified
and preserves all spaces between other boxes;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Move - Shrink + Move,,Moves box inside or outside the row
in this row it moves the boxes if required
and also shrinks all spaces between other boxes if required;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,9,box,Move - Shrink + Move + Between,,Moves box inside or outside the row
in this row it moves the boxes if required
and also it shrinks all spaces between other boxes if required
and if placed on box drops near to the box edge;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Move - none + Resize,,Moves box inside or outside the row
in this row it resizes the boxes if required
it preserves position of all other boxes;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,9,box,Move - Append + Shift + Move,,Moves box inside or outside the row
in this row it appends and joins the box if moved to edge of another box
and moves the box if required and preserves spaces between other boxes
Dragging with right button splits the boxes and always moves only one box;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,11,box,Move Single - Append + Shrink + Move,,Moves always single box inside or outside the row
in this row it appends and joins the box if moved to edge of another box
and moves the box if required and shrink spaces between other boxes if required;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Copy - Shrink + Move,,Copies box inside or outside the row
in this row it moves the box if required and shrink spaces between other boxes if required;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed
01/02/2010,6,box,Copy - Entire,,Copies all boxes together;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Remove - none,,Moves box inside or outside the row and moves the next boxes to the original box place
and preserves all other box positions;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,6,box,Move fixed - none,,Moves also fixed box inside or outside the row
and preserves all other box positions
The start box cannot be moved outside - it just slides the whole row;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed

12/28/2009,2,bound;01/02/2010,9,box,Various actions for different keys,,Left button = Slide - Shrink
Left button + Ctrl = Slide+All - Shrink+All
Left button + Shift = Slide - Shift
Right button = Move - Shrink+Move
Right button + Ctrl = Move+All - Shrink+Move+All
Right button + Shift = Copy - Shrink + Move
Resize + Left button = Resize
Resize + Left button + Ctrl = Resize+All;01/15/2010,3,,A;01/18/2010,2,,B;01/22/2010,2,,C;3,,D;1,nbsp,E;1,,F;01/29/2010,2,,G;02/04/2010,2,fixed
